name: Shots Studios, Inc.
description: Operator of a creator network intended to provide media management services to influencers and celebrities. The company creates original mobile-first content, primarily for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok and Snapchat, enabling creators to easily manage their content and its promotions.
one_liner: Operator of a creator network intended to provide media management services to influencers and celebrities. The company creates original mobile-first content, primarily for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok and Snapchat, enabling creators to easily manage their content and its promotions.
